ratata aadaraya karana kammali nathi kriyashili tharuna parapurak athi kirima sandaha owun thula aakalpamaya wenasak sidu kirime wada piliwelak thama sakas karana bawa kolambaa disthrikkaye manapa layisthuwe palamu sthanayata pamini hirunika premachandra menawiya prakasha kalaya.thama labu mema athiwishishta jayagrahanayata sama athinma dayakawu siyalu denata pranamaya pudakirima sandaha shri lanka padanam aayathanaye eeye (31) pawathi wishesha madhya hamuwaka di aya me bawa prakasha kalaya.mehi di wadi duratath katha kala premachandra menawiya, janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha thamata upades laba denawita pawasuwe api kopamana marga sanwardhanaya kalath godanangili indikeruwath rate jiwanaliya bandu tharuna parapura nisi manga noyanawanam ee sanwardhanayen palak nathi bawayi.
